ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: Hello There, I’m Rodolphe. For the past 2 years, web developpement has been a big part of my life. After graduating at ENSIM I’m a now au Fullstack Developer at Sodius-Willert and an aspiring freelancer on my FreeTime.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: My goal is to create engaging applications with high standards on user-experience and user interface.
